articles.description: South Africa’s ongoing steelworker strike is likely to lead to job cuts, further hammering an industry that’s been in decline for several years, according to the country’s main employer body.

articles.author: James Vincent
articles.title: This bipedal robot uses propeller arms to slackline and skateboard - The Verge
articles.description: Roboticists from Caltech have created a bipedal robot with propeller arms that can slackline and skateboard. The multi-modal design lets the robot, LEONARDO, walk and fly.
articles.content:
Big deal, I could do that too if I had propellers for arms
LEONARDO can fly and walk thanks to bipedal legs and propeller arms. 
Image: Caltech Aerospace Robotics and Control Lab / Science Robotics… [+2868 chars]
